alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:09PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weber...south central Box Elder...northwestern Salt Lake...Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 509 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, or 18 miles southwest of Hill Air Force Base, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, South Ogden, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, West Bountiful and Marriott-Slaterville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 316 and 351. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
